Function Documentation

orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxScript_ExecuteFunction ( orxSCRIPT_FUNCTION *  _pstFunctionInfo,
const orxSCRIPT_PARAM *  _pstInputValues,
orxSCRIPT_PARAM *  _pstOutputValue 
)

Executes a callback with input parameters, returns the result of the called function in the output

Parameters:
_pstFunctionInfo (IN) Function info
_pstInputValues (IN) Array of input parameters
_pstOutputValue (OUT) Returned value from the function
Returns:
Return orxSTATUS_SUCCESS if the function has been correctly executed, else orxSTATUS_FAILURE

orxFLOAT *  _fOutValue 
)

Gets a global script variable value

Parameters:
_zVar (IN) Variable name
_fOutValue (OUT) Float returns value
Returns:
Returns orxSTATUS_SUCCESS is variable exists and is of the right type, else returns orxSTATUS_FAILURE

orxDLLAPI orxSCRIPT_FUNCTION* orxScript_GetFunctionInfo ( orxS32  _s32Index  ) 

Returns function info from an index or orxNULL if not found

Parameters:
_s32Index (IN) parameter index
Returns:
Returns the pointer on the function info if valid index, else returns orxNULL.

orxDLLAPI orxSCRIPT_TYPE orxScript_GetType ( const orxSTRING  _zVar  ) 

Gets a global variable type

Parameters:
_zVar (IN) Variable name
Returns:
Returns the type of the given variable. Returns orxSCRIPT_TYPE_NONE if variable not found.

orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxScript_RegisterFunction ( orxS32  _s32Index  ) 

Sets a global script variable value

Parameters:
_s32Index (IN) Index of the function data from the global list
Returns:
Returns orxSTATUS_SUCCESS if valid registration, else orxSTATUS_FAILURE

orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxScript_RegisterFunctionGlobal ( const orxSTRING  _zFunctionName,
orxSCRIPT_FUNCTION_PTR  _pfnFunction,
const orxSTRING  _zParamTypes 
)

Function to register a new function in the system. This function sotre the parameters in the global list, gets the new entry index and call the plugin register function

Parameters:
_zFunctionName (IN) String value of the function
_pfnFunction (IN) Function pointer
_zParamTypes (IN) List of type for the function (the first parameter is the return type)

Parses and runs a script file

Parameters:
_zFileName (IN) File name
Returns:
Returns Success if valid parsing/execution, else returns orxSTATUS_FAILURE

Parses and runs a script string

Parameters:

Returns:
